problems.title: Compute Factorial of a Number
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Write a recursive function to compute the factorial of a given non-negative integer N.

Input Format
Single integer N

Output Format
Single integer: N!

Example
Input:
5

Output:
120
hintsList: Base case: if n == 0 return  →  return 1

problems.title: Print Fibonacci Series using Recursion
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an integer N, print the first N Fibonacci numbers starting from 0 using recursion.

Input Format
Single integer N

Output Format
Print N Fibonacci numbers in one line separated by space.

Example
Input:
8

Output:
0 1 1 2 3 5 8 13
